text: The Story of Babar () is a French picture book written and illustrated by Jean de Brunhoff. It was published in 1931. It was published in English in 1933. The story is about a little elephant who travels to the civilized world. He brings back to his jungle animal friends what he has discovered to benefit them. Category:Children's picture books Category:1930s books Category:Books with jungle settings Category:French literature Category:1931 works
title: The Story of Babar
